// å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªè¿”å›æ‡’æ‰§è¡Œå“åº”å¼æ•°æ®çš„å‡½æ•°
function useDebouncedRef(value,delay=200){
    let timeout;
    return customRef((track,trigger)=>{
        return {
            get(){
                track();
                return value;
            },
            set(newValue){
                clearTimeout(timeout);
                timeout = setTimeout(()=>{
                    value = newValue;
                    trigger();
                },delay)     
            }
        }
    })
}

<template>

<script type="text/javascript">
export default {
  name: "demo",
  data() {
    return {
      message: "Hello",
    };
  },
  computed: {
    reversedMessage: function () {
      return this.message.split("").reverse().join("");
    },
  },
};
</script>

class Subject {
  constructor() {
    this.state = 0;
    this.observers = [];
  }
  getState() {
    return this.state;
  }
  setState(state) {
    this.state = state;
    this.notifyAllObservers();
  }
  notifyAllObservers() {
    this.observers.forEach((observer) => {
      observer.update();
    });
  }
  attach(observer) {
    this.observers.push(observer);
  }
}
// è§‚å¯Ÿè€…
class Observer {
  constructor(name, subject) {
    this.name = name;
    this.subject = subject;
    this.subject.attach(this);
  }
  update() {
    console.log(`${this.name} update, state: ${this.subject.getState()}`);
  }
}
// æµ‹è¯•
let s = new Subject();
let o1 = new Observer("o1", s);

s.setState(12);

class Iterator {
  constructor(conatiner) {
    this.list = conatiner.list;
    this.index = 0;
  }
  next() {
    if (this.hasNext()) {
      return this.list[this.index++];
    }
    return null;
  }
  hasNext() {
    if (this.index >= this.list.length) {
      return false;
    }
    return true;
  }
}
class Container {
  constructor(list) {
    this.list = list;
  }
  getIterator() {
    return new Iterator(this);
  }
}
// æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç 
let container = new Container([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]);
let iterator = container.getIterator();
while (iterator.hasNext()) {
  console.log(iterator.next());
}

ç­–ç•¥æ¨¡å¼

å®šä¹‰ä¸€ç³»åˆ—çš„ç®—æ³•ï¼ŒæŠŠå®ƒä»¬ä¸€ä¸ªä¸ªå°è£…èµ·æ¥ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä½¿å®ƒä»¬å¯ä»¥äº’ç›¸æ›¿æ¢

<html>
  <head>
    <title>ç­–ç•¥æ¨¡å¼-æ ¡éªŒè¡¨å•</title>
    <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="Content-Type" />
  </head>

  <body>
    <form id="registerForm" method="post" action="http://xxxx.com/api/register">
      ç”¨æˆ·åï¼š<input type="text" name="userName" /> å¯†ç ï¼š<input
        type="text"
        name="password"
      />
      æ‰‹æœºå·ç ï¼š<input type="text" name="phoneNumber" />
      <button type="submit">æäº¤</button>
    </form>
    <script type="text/javascript">
      // ç­–ç•¥å¯¹è±¡
      const strategies = {
        isNoEmpty: function (value, errorMsg) {
          if (value === "") {
            return errorMsg;
          }
        },
        isNoSpace: function (value, errorMsg) {
          if (value.trim() === "") {
            return errorMsg;
          }
        },
        minLength: function (value, length, errorMsg) {
          if (value.trim().length < length) {
            return errorMsg;
          }
        },
        maxLength: function (value, length, errorMsg) {
          if (value.length > length) {
            return errorMsg;
          }
        },
        isMobile: function (value, errorMsg) {
          if (
            !/^(13[0-9]|14[5|7]|15[0|1|2|3|5|6|7|8|9]|17[7]|18[0|1|2|3|5|6|7|8|9])\d{8}$/.test(
              value
            )
          ) {
            return errorMsg;
          }
        },
      };
      // éªŒè¯ç±»
      class Validator {
        constructor() {
          this.cache = [];
        }
        add(dom, rules) {
          for (let i = 0, rule; (rule = rules[i++]); ) {
            let strategyAry = rule.strategy.split(":");
            let errorMsg = rule.errorMsg;
            this.cache.push(() => {
              let strategy = strategyAry.shift();
              strategyAry.unshift(dom.value);
              strategyAry.push(errorMsg);
              return strategies[strategy].apply(dom, strategyAry);
            });
          }
        }
        start() {
          for (let i = 0, validatorFunc; (validatorFunc = this.cache[i++]); ) {
            let errorMsg = validatorFunc();
            if (errorMsg) {
              return errorMsg;
            }
          }
        }
      }
      // è°ƒç”¨ä»£ç 
      let registerForm = document.getElementById("registerForm");
      let validataFunc = function () {
        let validator = new Validator();
        validator.add(registerForm.userName, [
          {
            strategy: "isNoEmpty",
            errorMsg: "ç”¨æˆ·åä¸å¯ä¸ºç©º",
          },
          {
            strategy: "isNoSpace",
            errorMsg: "ä¸å…è®¸ä»¥ç©ºç™½å­—ç¬¦å‘½å",
          },
          {
            strategy: "minLength:2",
            errorMsg: "ç”¨æˆ·åé•¿åº¦ä¸èƒ½å°äº2ä½",
          },
        ]);
        validator.add(registerForm.password, [
          {
            strategy: "minLength:6",
            errorMsg: "å¯†ç é•¿åº¦ä¸èƒ½å°äº6ä½",
          },
        ]);
        validator.add(registerForm.phoneNumber, [
          {
            strategy: "isMobile",
            errorMsg: "è¯·è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„æ‰‹æœºå·ç æ ¼å¼",
          },
        ]);
        return validator.start();
      };

      registerForm.onsubmit = function () {
        let errorMsg = validataFunc();
        if (errorMsg) {
          alert(errorMsg);
          return false;
        }
      };
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

class ExamCar {

}
/* åœ¨æœ¬è½¦ä¸Šè€ƒè¯• */
examine(candidateId) {

        setTimeout(() => {

ManualExamCarPool = {
\_pool: [], // é©¾è€ƒè½¦å¯¹è±¡æ± 
\_candidateQueue: [], // è€ƒç”Ÿé˜Ÿåˆ—
/* æ³¨å†Œè€ƒç”Ÿ ID åˆ—è¡¨ */
registCandidates(candidateList) {

},
/* æ³¨å†Œæ‰‹åŠ¨æ¡£è€ƒç”Ÿ */
registCandidate(candidateId) {

        .then(() => {
            const nextCandidateId = this._candidateQueue.length && this._candidateQueue.shift()

  } else this._candidateQueue.push(candidateId)
},
/* æ³¨å†Œæ‰‹åŠ¨æ¡£è½¦ */
initManualExamCar(manualExamCarNum) {

},
/* è·å–çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºæœªè¢«å ç”¨çš„æ‰‹åŠ¨æ¡£è½¦ */
getManualExamCar() {

}

    this.list = [];
  }
  add(memento) {
    this.list.push(memento);
  }
  get(index) {
    return this.list[index];
  }
}
// ç¼–è¾‘å™¨
class Editor {
  constructor() {
    this.content = null;
  }
  setContent(content) {
    this.content = content;
  }
  getContent() {
    return this.content;
  }
  saveContentToMemento() {
    return new Memento(this.content);
  }
  getContentFromMemento(memento) {
    this.content = memento.getContent();
  }
}
//æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç 
let editor = new Editor();
let careTaker = new CareTaker();
editor.setContent("111");
editor.setContent("222");
careTaker.add(editor.saveContentToMemento());
editor.setContent("333");
careTaker.add(editor.saveContentToMemento());
editor.setContent("444");
console.log(editor.getContent()); //444
editor.getContentFromMemento(careTaker.get(1));
console.log(editor.getContent()); //333
editor.getContentFromMemento(careTaker.get(0));
console.log(editor.getContent()); //222

class A {
  constructor() {
    this.number = 0;
  }
  setNumber(num, m) {
    this.number = num;
    if (m) {
      m.setB();
    }
  }
}
class B {
  constructor() {
    this.number = 0;
  }
  setNumber(num, m) {
    this.number = num;
    if (m) {
      m.setA();
    }
  }
}
class Mediator {
  constructor(a, b) {
    this.a = a;
    this.b = b;
  }
  setA() {
    let number = this.b.number;
    this.a.setNumber(number / 10);
  }
  setB() {
    let number = this.a.number;
    this.b.setNumber(number / 10);
  }
}
let a = new A();
let b = new B();
let m = new Mediator(a, b);
a.setNumber(10, m);
console.log(a.number, b.number);
b.setNumber(10, m);
console.log(a.number, b.number);

class Context {
  constructor() {
    this._list = []; // å­˜æ”¾ ç»ˆç»“ç¬¦è¡¨è¾¾å¼
    this._sum = 0; // å­˜æ”¾ éç»ˆç»“ç¬¦è¡¨è¾¾å¼(è¿ç®—ç»“æœ)
  }
  get sum() {
    return this._sum;
  }
  set sum(newValue) {
    this._sum = newValue;
  }
  add(expression) {
    this._list.push(expression);
  }
  get list() {
    return [...this._list];
  }
}
class PlusExpression {
  interpret(context) {
    if (!(context instanceof Context)) {
      throw new Error("TypeError");
    }
    context.sum = ++context.sum;
  }
}
class MinusExpression {
  interpret(context) {
    if (!(context instanceof Context)) {
      throw new Error("TypeError");
    }
    context.sum = --context.sum;
  }
}
/** ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç  **/
const context = new Context();
// ä¾æ¬¡æ·»åŠ : åŠ æ³• | åŠ æ³• | å‡æ³• è¡¨è¾¾å¼
context.add(new PlusExpression());
context.add(new PlusExpression());
context.add(new MinusExpression());
// ä¾æ¬¡æ‰§è¡Œ: åŠ æ³• | åŠ æ³• | å‡æ³• è¡¨è¾¾å¼
context.list.forEach((expression) => expression.interpret(context));
console.log(context.sum);

import express from 'express';
const app = express();
app.get('/api/sse', (req, res) => {
    res.writeHead(200, {

        'Connection': 'close'

    const data = fs.readFileSync('./index.txt', 'utf8')
    const total = data.length;
    let current = 0;
    //mock sse æ•°æ®
    let time = setInterval(() => {
        console.log(current, total)
        if (current >= total) {
            console.log('end')
            clearInterval(time)
            return
        }
        //è¿”å›è‡ªå®šä¹‰äº‹ä»¶å
        res.write(`event:name\n`)
        //è¿”å›æ•°æ®
        res.write(`data:${data.split('')[current]}\n\n`)
        current++
    }, 300)
})
app.listen(3000, () => {
    console.log('Listening on port 3000');
});

jså¤åˆ¶ä»£ç const crypto = require('node:crypto');

// ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªéšæœºçš„ 16 å­—èŠ‚çš„åˆå§‹åŒ–å‘é‡ (IV)
const iv = Buffer.from(crypto.randomBytes(16));

const key = crypto.randomBytes(32);

// åˆ›å»ºåŠ å¯†å®ä¾‹ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ AES-256-CBC ç®—æ³•ï¼Œæä¾›å¯†é’¥å’Œåˆå§‹åŒ–å‘é‡

å¯¹ç§°åŠ å¯†æ˜¯ä¸€ç§ç®€å•è€Œå¿«é€Ÿçš„åŠ å¯†æ–¹å¼ï¼Œå®ƒä½¿ç”¨ç›¸åŒçš„å¯†é’¥ï¼ˆç§°ä¸ºå¯¹ç§°å¯†é’¥ï¼‰æ¥è¿›è¡ŒåŠ å¯†å’Œè§£å¯†ã€‚è¿™æ„å‘³ç€å‘é€è€…å’Œæ¥æ”¶è€…åœ¨åŠ å¯†å’Œè§£å¯†è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­éƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ç›¸åŒçš„å¯†é’¥ã€‚å¯¹ç§°åŠ å¯†ç®—æ³•çš„åŠ å¯†é€Ÿåº¦å¾ˆå¿«ï¼Œé€‚åˆå¯¹å¤§é‡æ•°æ®è¿›è¡ŒåŠ å¯†å’Œè§£å¯†æ“ä½œã€‚ç„¶è€Œï¼Œå¯¹ç§°å¯†é’¥çš„å®‰å…¨æ€§æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæŒ‘æˆ˜ï¼Œå› ä¸ºéœ€è¦ç¡®ä¿å‘é€è€…å’Œæ¥æ”¶è€…éƒ½å®‰å…¨åœ°å…±äº«å¯†é’¥ï¼Œå¦åˆ™æœ‰é£é™©è¢«æœªæˆæƒçš„äººè·å–å¯†é’¥å¹¶è§£å¯†æ•°æ®ã€‚

const ejs = require('ejs'); // å¯¼å…¥ejsåº“ï¼Œç”¨äºæ¸²æŸ“æ¨¡æ¿
const fs = require('node:fs'); // å¯¼å…¥fsæ¨¡å—ï¼Œç”¨äºæ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿæ“ä½œ
const marked = require('marked'); // å¯¼å…¥markedåº“ï¼Œç”¨äºå°†Markdownè½¬æ¢ä¸ºHTML
const readme = fs.readFileSync('README.md'); // è¯»å–README.mdæ–‡ä»¶çš„å†…å®¹,ç›´æ¥readçš„ç»“æœæ˜¯bufferä¸­çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œé€šè¿‡toStringæ–¹æ³•å˜ä¸ºåŸå§‹å†…å®¹
const browserSync = require('browser-sync'); // å¯¼å…¥browser-syncåº“ï¼Œç”¨äºå®æ—¶é¢„è§ˆå’ŒåŒæ­¥æµè§ˆå™¨
const openBrowser =  () => {
    // åˆ›å»ºæµè§ˆå™¨æœåŠ¡
    const browser = browserSync.create()
    // åˆå§‹åŒ–æµè§ˆå™¨æœåŠ¡ ï¼Œä¼ å…¥ç›®å½•å’Œä¸»é¡µ
    browser.init({
        server: {
            baseDir: './',
            index: 'index.html',
        }
    })
    return browser
}
// ejsæ¨¡æ¿è¿›è¡Œæ¸²æŸ“ï¼Œä¼ å…¥å˜é‡
ejs.renderFile('template.ejs', {
    content: marked.parse(readme.toString()),
    title:'markdown to html'
},(err,data)=>{
    if(err){
        console.log(err)
    }
    // å°†æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹å†™å…¥åˆ°index.html
    let writeStream = fs.createWriteStream('index.html')
    writeStream.write(data)
    writeStream.close()
    writeStream.on('finish',()=>{
        // index.htmlå†™å…¥å®Œæ¯•ä¹‹åï¼Œæ‰“å¼€æµè§ˆå™¨å®æ—¶é¢„è§ˆ
        openBrowser()
    })
})

/* Markdowné€šç”¨æ ·å¼ */

å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡urlæ¨¡å—æ¥è§£æreqçš„è¯·æ±‚è·¯å¾„ï¼Œæ¥è¿›ä¸€æ­¥ç²¾ç»†åŒ–å“åº”å†…å®¹ã€‚

const http = require('node:http'); // å¼•å…¥ http æ¨¡å—
const url = require('node:url'); // å¼•å…¥ url æ¨¡å—
// åˆ›å»º HTTP æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œå¹¶ä¼ å…¥å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ç”¨äºå¤„ç†è¯·æ±‚å’Œç”Ÿæˆå“åº”
http.createServer((req, res) => {
  const { pathname, query } = url.parse(req.url, true); // è§£æè¯·æ±‚çš„ URLï¼Œè·å–è·¯å¾„å’ŒæŸ¥è¯¢å‚æ•°
  if (req.method === 'POST') { // æ£€æŸ¥è¯·æ±‚æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯å¦ä¸º POST
    if (pathname === '/post') { // æ£€æŸ¥è·¯å¾„æ˜¯å¦ä¸º '/post'
      let data = '';
      req.on('data', (chunk) => {
        data += chunk; // è·å– POST è¯·æ±‚çš„æ•°æ®
        console.log(data);
      });
      req.on('end', () => {
        res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json'); // è®¾ç½®å“åº”å¤´çš„ Content-Type ä¸º 'application/json'
        res.statusCode = 200; // è®¾ç½®å“åº”çŠ¶æ€ç ä¸º 200
        res.end(data); // å°†è·å–åˆ°çš„æ•°æ®ä½œä¸ºå“åº”ä½“è¿”å›
      });
    } else {
      res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json'); // è®¾ç½®å“åº”å¤´çš„ Content-Type ä¸º 'application/json'
      res.statusCode = 404; // è®¾ç½®å“åº”çŠ¶æ€ç ä¸º 404
      res.end('Not Found'); // è¿”å› 'Not Found' ä½œä¸ºå“åº”ä½“
    }
  } else if (req.method === 'GET') { // æ£€æŸ¥è¯·æ±‚æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯å¦ä¸º GET
    if (pathname === '/get') { // æ£€æŸ¥è·¯å¾„æ˜¯å¦ä¸º '/get'
      console.log(query.a); // æ‰“å°æŸ¥è¯¢å‚æ•°ä¸­çš„é”®åä¸º 'a' çš„å€¼
      res.end('get success'); // è¿”å› 'get success' ä½œä¸ºå“åº”ä½“
    }
  }
}).listen(98, () => {
  console.log('server is running on port 98'); // æ‰“å°æœåŠ¡å™¨å¯åŠ¨çš„ä¿¡æ¯
});

                    "Cache-Control": "public, max-age=3600" // è®¾ç½®ç¼“å­˜æ§åˆ¶å¤´

})

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
    <style>
        * {
            padding: 0;
            margin: 0;
        }
        html,
        body,
        .room {
            height: 100%;
            width: 100%;
        }
        .room {
            display: flex;
        }
        .left {
            width: 300px;
            border-right: 0.5px solid #f5f5f5;
            background: #333;
        }
        .right {
            background: #1c1c1c;
            flex: 1;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
        }
        .header {
            background: #8d0eb0;
            color: white;
            padding: 10px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            font-size: 20px;
        }
        .main {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 10px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            font-size: 20px;
            overflow: auto;
        }
        .main-chat {
            color: green;
        }
        .footer {
            min-height: 200px;
            border-top: 1px solid green;
        }
        .footer .ipt {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            color: green;
            outline: none;
            font-size: 20px;
            padding: 10px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        .groupList {
            height: 100%;
            overflow: auto;
        }
        .groupList-items {
            height: 50px;
            width: 100%;
            background: #131313;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: white;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<div class="room">
    <div class="left">
        <div class="groupList">
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="right">
        <header class="header">èŠå¤©å®¤</header>
        <main class="main">
        </main>
        <footer class="footer">
            <div class="ipt" contenteditable></div>
        </footer>
    </div>
</div>
<body>
    <script type="module">
        const sendMessage = (message) => {
            const div = document.createElement('div');
            div.className = 'main-chat';
            div.innerText = `${message.user}:${message.text}`;
            main.appendChild(div)
        }
        const groupEl = document.querySelector('.groupList');
        const main = document.querySelector('.main');
        import { io } from "https://cdn.socket.io/4.7.4/socket.io.esm.min.js";
        const name = prompt('è¯·è¾“å…¥ä½ çš„åå­—');
        const room = prompt('è¯·è¾“å…¥æˆ¿é—´å·');
        const socket = io('ws://localhost:3000');
        //é”®ç›˜æŒ‰ä¸‹å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
        document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
            if (e.key === 'Enter') {
                e.preventDefault();
                const ipt = document.querySelector('.ipt');
                socket.emit('message', {
                    text: ipt.innerText,
                    room: room,
                    user: name
                });
                sendMessage({
                    text: ipt.innerText,
                    user: name,
                })
                ipt.innerText = '';
            }
        })
        //è¿æ¥æˆåŠŸsocket
        socket.on('connect', () => {
            socket.emit('join', { name, room });//åŠ å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæˆ¿é—´
            socket.on('message', (message) => {
                sendMessage(message)
            })
            socket.on('groupList', (groupList) => {
                console.log(groupList);
                groupEl.innerHTML = ''
                Object.keys(groupList).forEach(key => {
                    const item = document.createElement('div');
                    item.className = 'groupList-items';
                    item.innerText = `æˆ¿é—´åç§°:${key} æˆ¿é—´äººæ•°:${groupList[key].length}`
                    groupEl.appendChild(item)
                })
            })
        })
    </script>
</body>
</html>

import http from 'http'
import { Server } from 'socket.io'
import express from 'express'
const app = express()
app.use('*', (req, res, next) => {
    res.setHeader("Access-Control-Allow-Origin", "*");
    res.setHeader("Access-Control-Allow-Headers", "*");
    res.setHeader("Access-Control-Allow-Methods", "*");
    next();
})
const server = http.createServer(app)
const io = new Server(server, {
    cors: true //å…è®¸è·¨åŸŸ
})
const groupList = {}
/**
 * [{1008:[{name,room,id}]}]
 */
io.on('connection', (socket) => {
    //åŠ å…¥æˆ¿é—´
    socket.on('join', ({ name, room }) => {
        socket.join(room)
        if (groupList[room]) {
            groupList[room].push({ name, room, id: socket.id })
        } else {
            groupList[room] = [{ name, room, id: socket.id }]
        }
        socket.emit('message', { user: 'ç®¡ç†å‘˜', text: `${name}è¿›å…¥äº†æˆ¿é—´` })
        socket.emit('groupList', groupList)
        socket.broadcast.emit('groupList', groupList)
    })
    //å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
    socket.on('message', ({ text, room, user }) => {
        socket.broadcast.to(room).emit('message', {
            text,
            user
        })
    })
    //æ–­å¼€é“¾æ¥å†…ç½®äº‹ä»¶
    socket.on('disconnect', () => {
        Object.keys(groupList).forEach(key => {
            let leval = groupList[key].find(item => item.id === socket.id)
            if (leval) {
                socket.broadcast.to(leval.room).emit('message', { user: 'ç®¡ç†å‘˜', text: `${leval.name}ç¦»å¼€äº†æˆ¿é—´` })
            }
            groupList[key] = groupList[key].filter(item => item.id !== socket.id)
        })
        socket.broadcast.emit('groupList', groupList)
    })
});
server.listen(3000, () => {
    console.log('listening on :3000');
});

#define NAPI_VERSION 3  //æŒ‡å®šaddonç‰ˆæœ¬
#define NAPI_CPP_EXCEPTIONS //å¯ç”¨ Node.js N-API ä¸­çš„ C++ å¼‚å¸¸æ”¯æŒ
#include <napi.h>  //addon API
#include <windows.h> //windwos API

Napi::Value GetScreenSize(const Napi::CallbackInfo& info) {
    Napi::Env env = info.Env(); //æŒ‡å®šç¯å¢ƒ

    int cx = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXSCREEN); //è·å–è®¾å¤‡å®½
    int cy = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYSCREEN); //è·å–è®¾å¤‡é«˜

    Napi::Object result = Napi::Object::New(env); //åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡
    result.Set("width", cx);
    result.Set("height", cy);

    return result; //è¿”å›å¯¹è±¡
}

Napi::Object Init(Napi::Env env, Napi::Object exports) {
    //æŠ›å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°  getScreenSize 
    exports.Set("getScreenSize", Napi::Function::New(env, GetScreenSize));
    return exports;
}
//addonå›ºå®šè¯­æ³• å¿…é¡»æŠ›å‡ºè¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•

<script>
    const fileDOM = document.getElementById('file');
    fileDOM.addEventListener('change',(e)=>{
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        //å¯¹æ–‡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œåˆ†ç‰‡
        const chunks = sliceFile(file);
        //ä¸Šä¼ åˆ†ç‰‡æ•°æ®
        postChunksData(chunks);
    })
    function sliceFile(file,size=1024 * 1024 * 4) {
        const chunks = [];
        for(let i=0;i<file.size;i+=size){
            chunks.push(file.slice(i , i + size));
        }
        return chunks;
    }
    function postChunksData(chunks) {
        const list = [];
        for(let i=0;i<chunks.length;i++){
            //ä½¿ç”¨formDataä¸Šä¼ æ‰€æœ‰åˆ†ç‰‡
            const formData = new FormData();
            formData.append('index',i);
            formData.append('total',chunks.length);
            formData.append('fileName','åˆ†ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶');
            formData.append('file',chunks[i]);
            list.push(fetch('http://localhost:3000/up',{
                method:'POST',
                body: formData,
            }))
        }
        //ä¸Šä¼ å®Œæ‰€æœ‰åˆ†ç‰‡ä¹‹åå°†æ–‡ä»¶åˆå¹¶
        Promise.all(list).then(res => {
            fetch('http://localhost:3000/merge',{
                method:"POST",
                headers:{
                    "Content-Type":"application/json"
                },
                body:JSON.stringify({
                    fileName:"åˆ†ç‰‡ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶",
                })
            }).then(res=>{
                console.log(res);
            })
        })
    }    
</script>

import express from 'express'
import multer from 'multer'
import cors from 'cors'
import fs from 'node:fs'
import path from 'node:path'
const storage = multer.diskStorage({
    destination: (req, file, cb) => {
        cb(null, 'uploads/')
    },
    filename: (req, file, cb) => {
        cb(null, `${req.body.index}-${req.body.fileName}`)
    }
})
const upload = multer({ storage })
const app = express()
app.use(cors())
app.use(express.json())
// ä½¿ç”¨multerå°†æ•°æ®å­˜åˆ°æœåŠ¡å™¨ç£ç›˜ä¸­
app.post('/up', upload.single('file'), (req, res) => {
    res.send('ok')
})
// ä½¿ç”¨fs.appendFileSyncå°†åˆ‡ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œåˆæˆ
app.post('/merge', async (req, res) => {
    const uploadPath = './uploads'
    let files = fs.readdirSync(path.join(process.cwd(), uploadPath))
    files = files.sort((a, b) => a.split('-')[0] - b.split('-')[0])
    const writePath = path.join(process.cwd(), `video`, `${req.body.fileName}.mp4`)
    files.forEach((item) => {
        fs.appendFileSync(writePath, fs.readFileSync(path.join(process.cwd(), uploadPath, item)))
        fs.unlinkSync(path.join(process.cwd(), uploadPath, item))
    })
    res.send('ok')
})
app.listen(3000, () => {
    console.log('Server is running on port 3000')
})

æ–‡ä»¶æµä¸‹è½½

      • attachmentï¼šæŒ‡ç¤ºæµè§ˆå™¨å°†å“åº”å†…å®¹ä½œä¸ºé™„ä»¶ä¸‹è½½ã€‚é€šå¸¸ä¸ filename å‚æ•°ä¸€èµ·ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œç”¨äºæŒ‡å®šä¸‹è½½æ–‡ä»¶çš„åç§°

                const blob = new Blob([res],{type:'image/png'})

import express from 'express'
import fs from 'fs'
import path from 'path'
import cors from 'cors'
const app = express()
app.use(cors())
app.use(express.json())
app.use(express.static('./static'))
app.post('/download', function (req, res) { //å½“è¯·æ±‚downloadè·¯å¾„æ—¶ï¼Œé€šè¿‡fsè¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶æ•°æ®ï¼Œè®¾ç½®å“åº”å¤´åè¿”å›æ–‡ä»¶æ•°æ®
    const fileName = req.body.fileName
    const filePath = path.join(process.cwd(), './static', fileName)
    const content = fs.readFileSync(filePath)
    res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/octet-stream')
    res.setHeader('Content-Disposition', 'attachment;filename=' + fileName)
    res.send(content)
})
app.listen(3000, () => {
    console.log('http://localhost:3000')
})

HTTPç¼“å­˜

HTTPç¼“å­˜åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤å¤§ç±»ï¼šå¼ºç¼“å­˜å’Œåå•†ç¼“å­˜ã€‚è¿™ä¸¤ç§ç¼“å­˜éƒ½æ˜¯é€šè¿‡HTTPå“åº”å¤´æ¥æ§åˆ¶ï¼Œç›®çš„æ˜¯æé«˜ç½‘ç«™çš„æ€§èƒ½ã€‚

  • å¼ºç¼“å­˜

    • å¼ºç¼“å­˜ä¹‹ååˆ™ä¸éœ€è¦é‡æ–°å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘é€è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ä»æµè§ˆå™¨ç¼“å­˜ï¼ˆå†…å­˜ç¼“å­˜æˆ–è€…ç¡¬ç›˜ç¼“å­˜ä¸­ï¼‰è¯»å–ã€‚

      • memory cache(å†…å­˜ç¼“å­˜) å†…å­˜ç¼“å­˜å­˜å‚¨åœ¨æµè§ˆå™¨å†…å­˜å½“ä¸­ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬åˆ·æ–°ç½‘é¡µçš„æ—¶å€™ä¼šå‘ç°å¾ˆå¤šå†…å­˜ç¼“å­˜
      • disk cache(ç¡¬ç›˜ç¼“å­˜) ç¡¬ç›˜ç¼“å­˜æ˜¯å­˜å‚¨åœ¨è®¡ç®—æœºç¡¬ç›˜ä¸­ï¼Œç©ºé—´å¤§ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¯»å–æ•ˆç‡æ¯”å†…å­˜ç¼“å­˜æ…¢

    • å¼ºç¼“å­˜è®¾ç½®éœ€è¦æœåŠ¡ç«¯è®¾ç½®å¯¹åº”çš„å“åº”å¤´Cache-Controlï¼Œå“åº”å¤´å«ä¹‰å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

      • max-ageï¼šæµè§ˆå™¨èµ„æºç¼“å­˜çš„æ—¶é•¿(ç§’)ã€‚
      • no-cacheï¼šä¸èµ°å¼ºç¼“å­˜ï¼Œèµ°åå•†ç¼“å­˜ã€‚
      • no-storeï¼šç¦æ­¢ä»»ä½•ç¼“å­˜ç­–ç•¥ã€‚
      • publicï¼šèµ„æºå³å¯ä»¥è¢«æµè§ˆå™¨ç¼“å­˜ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è¢«ä»£ç†æœåŠ¡å™¨ç¼“å­˜(CDN)ã€‚
      • privateï¼šèµ„æºåªèƒ½è¢«å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ç¼“å­˜ã€‚
    • const express = require('express');
const app = express();
app.get('/',(req,res)=>{
    res.setHeader('Cache-Control','public, max-age=20');

function average(numbers: number[]): number; // å‡½æ•°ç­¾å1ï¼šæ¥å—æ•°å­—æ•°ç»„å¹¶è¿”å›æ•°å­—
function average(...numbers: number[]): number; // å‡½æ•°ç­¾å2ï¼šæ¥å—å¯å˜æ•°é‡çš„æ•°å­—å‚æ•°å¹¶è¿”å›æ•°å­—
// å‡½æ•°å®ç°
function average(...args: any[]): number { // å®é™…å‡½æ•°å®ç°
    let sum = 0;
    if (args.length === 1 && Array.isArray(args[0])) { // å¦‚æœä¼ å…¥çš„æ˜¯æ•°ç»„
        const numbers = args[0] as number[]; // ç±»å‹æ–­è¨€ä¸ºæ•°å­—æ•°ç»„
        for (const num of numbers) {
            sum += num;
        }
        return sum / numbers.length;
    } else if (args.length > 1) { // å¦‚æœä¼ å…¥çš„æ˜¯å¤šä¸ªæ•°å­—
        for (const num of args) {
            sum += num;
        }
        return sum / args.length;
    } else {
        throw new Error('Invalid arguments'); // æŠ›å‡ºé”™è¯¯ï¼Œä¸æ”¯æŒçš„å‚æ•°ç±»å‹
    }
}

// è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°é‡è½½

function addMethod(object,name,fn){
    const old = object[name];
    object[name] = function (...args){
        if(args.length === fn.length){
            return fn.apply(this,args);
        }else if(typeof old === 'function'){
            return old.apply(this,args);
        }
    }
};
const searcher = {}; //å°†å¯¹è±¡ä¸­å¯¹åº”å±æ€§çš„é‡è½½æ–¹æ³•å…¨éƒ¨å­˜å‚¨èµ·æ¥
addMethod(searcher,'getUsers',()=>{
    console.log('æŸ¥è¯¢æ‰€æœ‰ç”¨æˆ·');
});

    console.log('æŒ‰ç…§å§“åæŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·');
});

å¦ä¸€ç§å®ç°æ–¹æ³•å°±æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨æ˜ å°„ï¼š

function createOverload(){
    const fnMap = new Map();
    function overload(...args){
        const key = args.map((it) => typeof it).join(',');
        const fn = fnMap.get(key);
        if(!fn){
            throw new TypeError('æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°å¯¹åº”çš„å®ç°');
        }
        return fn.apply(this,args);
    }
    overload.addImpl = function(...args){
        const fn = args.pop();
        if(typeof fn !== 'function'){
            throw new TypeError('æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°å¿…é¡»æ˜¯å‡½æ•°')
        }
        const key = args.join(',');
        fnMap.set(key,fn);
    };
    return overload;
}
const getUsers = createOverload();
getUsers.addImpl(()=>{
    console.log('æŸ¥è¯¢æ‰€æœ‰ç”¨æˆ·');
});
getUsers.addImpl('number',(page,size=10)=>{
    console.log('æŒ‰ç…§é¡µç å’Œæ•°é‡æŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·');
});
getUsers.addImpl('number','number',(page,size=10)=>{
    console.log('æŒ‰ç…§é¡µç å’Œæ•°é‡æŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·');
})
getUsers.addImpl('string',(name)=>{
    console.log('æŒ‰ç…§å§“åæŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·');
});
getUsers.addImpl('string','string',()=>{
    console.log('æŒ‰ç…§æ€§åˆ«æŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·');
});
getUsers('asfsdf');

  2. é€’å½’å®ç°ï¼š

    

```javascript
function deepCopy(obj, parent = null) {
    // åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°å¯¹è±¡
    let result = {};
    let keys = Object.keys(obj),
        key = null,
        temp = null,
        _parent = parent;
    // è¯¥å­—æ®µæœ‰çˆ¶çº§åˆ™éœ€è¦è¿½æº¯è¯¥å­—æ®µçš„çˆ¶çº§
    while (_parent) {
        // å¦‚æœè¯¥å­—æ®µå¼•ç”¨äº†å®ƒçš„çˆ¶çº§åˆ™ä¸ºå¾ªç¯å¼•ç”¨
        if (_parent.originalParent === obj) {
            // å¾ªç¯å¼•ç”¨ç›´æ¥è¿”å›åŒçº§çš„æ–°å¯¹è±¡
            return _parent.currentParent;
        }
        _parent = _parent.parent;
    }
    for (let i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
        key = keys[i];
        temp = obj[key];
        // å¦‚æœå­—æ®µçš„å€¼ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡
        if (temp && typeof temp === 'object') {
            // é€’å½’æ‰§è¡Œæ·±æ‹·è´ å°†åŒçº§çš„å¾…æ‹·è´å¯¹è±¡ä¸æ–°å¯¹è±¡ä¼ é€’ç»™ parent æ–¹ä¾¿è¿½æº¯å¾ªç¯å¼•ç”¨
            result[key] = DeepCopy(temp, {
                originalParent: obj,
                currentParent: result,
                parent: parent
            });

        } else {
            result[key] = temp;
        }
    }
    return result;
}
```

  3. MessageChannelå®ç°æ·±å…‹éš†ï¼šç”±äºæµè§ˆå™¨ä¸èƒ½å°†ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°æ­£ç¡®çš„å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å¦ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸èƒ½æ”¯æŒå‡½æ•°çš„æ·±å…‹éš†ã€‚

    function deepCopy(obj) {
  return new Promise((resolve) => {
    const {port1, port2} = new MessageChannel();
    port2.onmessage = ev => resolve(ev.data);
    port1.postMessage(obj);
  });
}

import { upload } from "./upload";
//è‡ªå®šä¹‰ä¸€äº›é’©å­å‡½æ•°
let beforeCreateParams;
let beforeUpload;
let afterUpload;
let onError = (err) => {
  console.error(err);
};

export function collect() {
  console.log("æ”¶é›†å¼€å§‹...");
}
// é‡‡é›†ä¿¡æ¯
function collection(customData, eventType) {
  let appId, pageId, timeStamp, ua;
  beforeCreateParams && beforeCreateParams();
  const metaList = document.getElementsByTagName("meta");
  for (let i = 0; i < metaList.length; i++) {
    const meta = metaList[i];
    console.log(meta.getAttribute("test-app-id"));
    if (meta.getAttribute("test-app-id")) {
      appId = meta.getAttribute("test-app-id");
    }
  }
  const body = document.body;
  pageId = body.getAttribute("test-page-id");
  if (!appId || !pageId) return;
  timeStamp = new Date().getTime();
  ua = window.navigator.userAgent;
  console.log(appId, pageId, timeStamp, ua);
  let data = `appId=${appId}&pageId=${pageId}&timeStamp=${timeStamp}&ua=${ua}`;
  if (beforeUpload) {
    data = beforeUpload(data); //å…è®¸å®šåˆ¶æ•°æ®
  }
  //æ—¥å¿—ä¸ŠæŠ¥
  // upload({ appId,pageId,timeStamp,ua })  ä¸å¸¸ç”¨
  let url, uploadData;
  try {
    data = { ...customData, ...data };
    const ret = upload(data, { eventType });
    url = ret.url;
    uploadData = ret.data;
  } catch (e) {
    onError(e);
  } finally {
    afterUpload && afterUpload(url, uploadData);
  }
}
//å‘é€PVæ—¥å¿—
export function sendPV() {
  collection({}, "PV");
}
// ä¸ŠæŠ¥æ›å…‰åŸ‹ç‚¹
export function sendExp(data = {}) {
  collection(data, "EXP");
}
//æ³¨å†Œé’©å­å‡½æ•°
export function registerBeforeCreateParams(fn) {
  beforeCreateParams = fn;
}
export function registerBeforeUpload(fn) {
  beforeUpload = fn;
}
export function registerAfterUpload(fn) {
  afterUpload = fn;
}
export function registerOnError(fn) {
  onError = fn;
}
export default {};

}

//....çœç•¥
export function collectAppear() {
  const appearEvent = new CustomEvent("onAppear");
  const disappearEvent = new CustomEvent("onDisappear");
  let ob;
  if (window.testMonitorObserver) {
    ob = window.testMonitorObserver;
  } else {
    ob = new IntersectionObserver(function (e) {
      e.forEach((item) => {
        if (item.intersectionRatio > 0) {
          console.log(item.target.className + "appear");
          item.target.dispatchEvent(appearEvent);
        } else {
          console.log(item.target.className + "disappear");
          item.target.dispatchEvent(disappearEvent);
        }
      });
    });
  }
  let obList = [];
  const appear = document.querySelectorAll("[appear]");
  for (let i = 0; i < appear.length; i++) {
    if (obList.includes(appear[i])) {
      ob.observe(appear[i]);
      obList.push(appear[i]);
    }
  }
  window.testMonitorObserver = ob; //å­˜èµ·æ¥é˜²æ­¢é‡å¤
  window.monitorObserverList = obList;
}
